Title: Relates to directing the public service commission to survey all utility poles throughout the state and assess their condition
Summary: Directs the public service commission to survey all utility poles throughout the state, assess their condition and report the condition of such utility poles to the owners of such utility poles; requires the owners of utility poles in poor condition or twenty or more years old to replace such poles or receive a fine.
LawCode: Add ยง119-d, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to directing the public service commission to survey all utility poles throughout the state and assess their condition
